_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: p2p Screensharing
author: admin@williamharrison.xyz
description: Chat and screenshare peer-to-peer, without a server, no account needed.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y git

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Remove existing files, if any
rm -rf **

# Clone repository
echo -e "Cloning repository"
git clone https://github.com/wdhdev/p2p-screensharing

# Move files
cd p2p-screensharing
mv * ../
cd ..
rm -rf p2p-screensharing

# Install dependencies
echo -e "Installing dependencies"
/usr/local/bin/npm install

echo -e "Install complete"
exit 0
